channel.title: [pi] Helpdesk
channel.description: I made a helpdesk for people who need help. What I need now is to get it to announce to a certain rank when people go there. Example: someone goes to helpdesk and it sends a message to a mod saying "player needs help at helpdesk" Can anyone help me with this?

item.title: [pi] Helpdesk
item.dc:creator: @saadmboy saadmboy
item.description:
@saadmboy wrote:

you could do it from clickingbuttons.java…or better yet make a command for it…

Read full topic
